T04sanss09u:1: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥś-lyôtpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca
T04sanss09u:10: tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti |
T04sanss09u:12: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti |
T04sanss09u:27: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkha daurmanasyôpāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatîti ||
T04sanss09u:30: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenânunayapratighâpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmânanuliptena
T04sanss09u:31: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā
T04sanss09u:34: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cânena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss09u:43: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim |
T04sanss09u:46: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ ||
T04sanss09u:53: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya |
T04sanss09u:56: na câbhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti |
T04sanss09u:57: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahāraka-
T04sanss09u:59: kaivartakarṣakâdīnāṃ duṣkhâbhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇâṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate |
T04sanss09u:61: tathā prākṛtâpi kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenâiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanâpi saṃgrāmayanty eva |
T04sanss09u:63: narakeṣu nâvadhyaghātakeṣu bhavacārakapālakeṣu niḥsaraṇadvāradignāśakeṣv ānukūlye 'pi dṛḍhataravādhākareṣv anapakṛtavairiṣv anavadhikalpâbaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet |
T04sanss09u:69: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-
T04sanss09u:74: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate |
T04sanss09u:76: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanss09u:77: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanss09u:78: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyârddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya
T04sanss09u:85: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanss09u:86: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya ||
T04sanss09u:88: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate |
T04sanss09u:89: akṣiṇy-utpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vâghātaṃ nirṇīya
T04sanss09u:94: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ caratâitat praṇidhānam abhūt |
T04sanss09u:99: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanss09u:100: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇâchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanss09u:103: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvânugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti |
T04sanss09u:104: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanss09u:105: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhâkrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye 'kṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanss09u:117: yāvad dharmânusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyânavalīnatânavamṛdyatâparitarṣaṇā
T04sanss09u:119: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyâudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasôtplavaḥ |
T04sanss09u:160: iti hi yā sarvêndriyeṣv anavalīnêndriyatêyam ucyate muditêty ādi ||
T04sanss09u:161: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe |
T04sanss09u:162: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti
T04sanss09u:163: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayâgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ
T04sanss09u:168: anāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārâdhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato |
T04sanss09u:183: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate |
T04sanss09u:199: sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ |
T04sanss09u:200: yatrâiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ vôtpādayiṣyati tatrâsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas |
T04sanss09u:201: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitânarthakarmāṇaḥ śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ |
T04sanss09u:202: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyântike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss09u:204: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyâpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyâpi tiryagyonigatasyâpi yamalokagatasyâpi manuṣyagatasyâpi
T04sanss09u:205: kāmâhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamâjīvagocarasya nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmârthaṃ kṛto na parârthaḥ |
T04sanss09u:206: sacet punar punar mamâite sarvasatvâparântakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathâpi mayâparityaktâiva sarvajñatā |
T04sanss09u:215: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate |
T04sanss09u:217: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvârambaṇā mahākaruṇā ||
T04sanss09u:224: evaṃ dharmagaṇanâviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate ||
T04sanss09u:228: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati |
T04sanss09u:231: yat kāye chidyamāne yâivâsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣârthaṃ kṣamate |
T04sanss09u:232: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ côpadarśayatîyam asya kṣāntipāramitā ||
T04sanss09u:233: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ nôtsṛjati cittabalâdhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti |
T04sanss09u:237: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittôtpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati
T04sanss09u:242: bhūtânityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtânātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyôpanidhyāyati
T04sanss09u:250: eṣâiva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss09u:255: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām anupaśāntānām arthāya
T04sanss09u:269: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi |
T04sanss09u:270: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe |
T04sanss09u:274: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nâghātayitavyaṃ
T04sanss09u:275: pareṣām antike na mamâitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣântaraṃ saṃjanayeyam
T04sanss09u:276: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣântaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye |
T04sanss09u:278: na mayâśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhôpadhānena
T04sanss09u:279: sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cânuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmâhaṃ vyāpadye
T04sanss09u:280: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ |
T04sanss09u:284: na mayā jīvitântarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T04sanss09u:287: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati |
